title: FLUX-Reason-6M & PRISM-Bench: A Million-Scale Text-to-Image Reasoning Dataset and Comprehensive Benchmark
summary: This paper introduces FLUX-Reason-6M and PRISM-Bench, a massive, large-scale, reasoning-focused dataset and comprehensive evaluation benchmark for text-to-image models. It addresses the lack of such resources in open-source systems.
usefulness_reason: The paper introduces a "large-scale, reasoning-focused dataset" and "massive dataset", which directly relates to "Contextual dataset".
